basics.name: Nguyen Chi Cuong
basics.label: Fullstack Web Developer
basics.summary: Senior Developer offering 4 years in the IT industry with a focus on Web Development. Experienced with all stages of the development cycle for dynamic web projects. Extensive experience in designing, developing, and implementing applications using Java Spring, NodeJS, Angular, VueJS as well as deploying applications to the cloud using Docker, Kubernetes
